summary: Resolved conflict in .claude-output.json: the file was deleted by origin/main (intentional removal of a transient AI-task metadata artifact) but present on this branch. Accepted the deletion since .claude-output.json is a generated ephemeral file not meant to persist in the codebase.
strategyUsed: accepted theirs (deletion) â€” .claude-output.json is a transient metadata file produced by the previous Claude task run; origin/main correctly removed it, and there is no functional reason to keep it in the repository
